Who: LORD ELDER, Elita, Straight Shot
Location: Ark - Command Center

> " Elita, it's been a long time, I missed you."
>
> She then looks to Lord Elder. She had met him at one time, but did not
> get the chance to really know him.
>
> "Lord Elder, Right? It's been a long time, and I think we were
> introduced a while ago, but, maybe ya don't remember who I am. If not,
> I'm Straight Shot, Tucson's half sister and his all time favorite weapon of choice.
> But we're not cheating, he does all the aiming and firing when he uses me.
> Oh, yeah, ya might not know that part. My alt modes are Cross Bow and
> regular bow. So, um, speakn' of my half brother.. He is okay right?"

Lord Elder turned around to take in Straight Shot, his optics widened
slightly, "Um, y . . yes" Elder stammered slightly trying to get his
words out, clearly at a loss. "I'm sorry." He said as he stood to face
her. "I had quite forgotten you were back there. I think I'm going to
have to make an inventory of who's back there." He said as he
chuckled.

He glanced back at the board which was intermittently giving radio
responses from the various Autobots and Maximal's as the ark
communication was able to receive it.

From what I can gather Tuscon is on his way out with Rodimus Prime,
Windlord and Nightlight as well." He paused and mumbled, "I can't
gaurantee what shape they'll be in though."

A radio transmission came through from Lord Persues at the old Maximal
Base . . .

> "Tuscon, I'm reading your location, please let us know if you need asistance," Perseus replied.  "Lord Elder, do you read?"

Elder turned as he got the transmission, "Yes, I am reading you loud
and clear." Elder slid back into his seat as he attenuated the
transmission, "We are standing by to receive any wounded from the
rescue mission, and we have Straight Shot here for any back up."

Elder glanced back at her grinning somewhat sheepishly, hoping that
his assumption was right.

(TAG)

Preston
